title: Custom Server Messages 插件配置文件无法修改
author: q691021659
txt_content:
config里不管修改任何东西 重载后都会恢复  后台报错内容好像是跟更新有关的  下面是报错  是不是要换一个版本= =

[17:45:58 INFO]: [CustomServerMessages] Disabling CustomServerMessages v4.2
[17:45:58 INFO]: [CustomServerMessages] CustomServerMessages is disabled success
fully! :-)
[17:45:58 INFO]: [CustomServerMessages] Developed by MrKrisKrisu.
[17:45:58 INFO]: [CustomServerMessages] Enabling CustomServerMessages v4.2
[17:46:03 WARN]: [CustomServerMessages] The updater could not contact dev.bukkit
.org for updating.
[17:46:03 WARN]: [CustomServerMessages] If you have not recently modified your c
onfiguration and this is the first time you are seeing this message, the site ma
y be experiencing temporary downtime.

replies.author: PlayerFJJ
replies.txt_content: 是不是把他原来的格式给弄错了，一般配置文件的每一个空格、符号都是不能乱改的~

replies.author: q691021659
PlayerFJJ
replies.txt_content:
q691021659 发表于 2014-8-1 20:39
我专门为了避免这个 只把false 改成true 依然不行
还要重启服务器
